transcript:
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Uh, sorry, I am Matram, calling from here, sir.
Executive: Uh, tell me.
Customer: Tell me, sir, why are you calling customers actually?
Executive: No, lead is not coming, madam. That's why madam, I called and asked Sujatha madam.
Customer: Okay.
Customer: I'm Sujatha only sir, tell me madam.
Executive: That's why madam, lead is not coming, that's why madam, I asked.
Executive: I had informed you first only. When you are coming initially, sir, one keyword cannot promote. That too, you are doing common product. Cup sambrani means you will get bulk orders, but specifically it will improve, I told.
Customer: No, two, two months have passed madam. Two months, can I sit idle madam?
Executive: I am telling the same thing. I am not telling. We have given you promotion.
Executive: Buyer call should come from buyer side, it depends on buyer's requirement.
Customer: Madam, enquiry call also not coming, enquiry message also not coming. If I ask them, you are telling ask them, if I ask them, you are telling ask you. Then whom should I ask madam?
Executive: Sir, that's why sir, it is buyer's wish. Directly call or message, if they search sambrani, if our company is satisfied, then they will message us.
Executive: You are doing common product, you are doing with only one single keyword.
Customer: That's why madam, you are there, you told, I had sent in morning whatsapp. First catalog, I have properly updated and given you. After that, you told you cannot see in laptop, that's why I have shared lead in whatsapp only.
Customer: Madam, this is what I am saying, after that, there is no lead.
Executive: No madam, now you, you have sent in the morning, this is highlighted two days before only. Okay? I am doing only cup sambrani, I am not doing other dhoop sambrani. I am doing only one product, I am doing one product, that's why I paid.
Executive: Okay? This one product, if you don't do one product, you will not get lead, if they had told before, I would not have paid, I would not have done anything.
Executive: For that, we should have provided one second option, sir. Because this client will have available in nearby locations.
Executive: Now, if client is searching giving keyword above 1000 kilometers, instead of paying transport amount, they will purchase in nearby only.
Executive: Online is like this only sir. Not only IndiaMART, in IndiaMART, there is 3 lakhs, 5 lakhs, 10 lakhs package. If you take any package, we will provide lead like this only. Conversion is full and full your side only.
Customer: I am seeing madam, I am seeing what is lead. If not, I have to uninstall madam, nothing can be done. If it goes, it goes, cost, nothing can be done.
Customer: What to do? I am calling you every 10 days and asking.
Executive: 30 days, 60 days, you have not paid for that sir. We don't want to give you lead, that is not our intention.
Customer: No, that's what madam, I am telling. Now, I asked, I asked, monthly how is lead, how is it, I will pay even yearly, if I tell, no, you have to pay yearly only, if they tell, okay, they told, you will get unlimited enquiry, sir, message also will come.
Customer: You will get lead like this, if they tell, we also waited for that only. Payment, before doing payment, 20000 piece, 20000 box came. After doing payment, we are struggling a lot. Then why are we taking service?
Executive: See past lead, I am telling, 5 to 10 lakhs, 1 to 2 lakhs order is there. But that buyer, our side. Yes. That's why, that's why, past lead, I saw. After seeing, I mean interested, I was putting only. That lead, I am not getting.
Executive: Go and see, how much lead is there. If it is not showing, you filter and check.
Executive: It will allocate based on your usage only.
Executive: See your competitors sir. Everyone is in verified client or business category. Without lead, they will not do. Same way, for sambrani cup, in IndiaMART, enquiries are good only.
Executive: Buyleads are allocating in daily basis. Ups and downs will be there. But lead will definitely come. If you call customer care, or if you call me, we will allocate lead, it is not like that. It is full and full systematic process. It will allocate like that only. You refresh and see, or filter and search.
Customer: Okay, I am seeing madam, I am seeing madam.
Executive: Because last time also, we had given one option. But you told, no, I want IndiaMART, lead, you allocate lead, you had told.
Customer: I am, to you only, not only to you sir. To everyone, this is the service. If you pay 5 lakhs and come also, we will support you like this only. If it is 3 lakhs also, this is it. If you have paid 30000 also, from which side, what best service we can do, that only we will do. You told lead is not coming, that's why I updated catalog, shared lead in whatsapp.
Executive: We are doing call in daily basis also.
Executive: One keyword, you think and see. Online, you are doing only one product means, this is all nearby available product. They will not mostly provide order from long, investing so much amount for transport. They will focus in nearby only.
Customer: That's why, no, no, that, no madam, if it is nearby also, they are doing. If transport, they will not spend so much and do, if you are telling us now, if I had known before, I would not have definitely done, that's what I am telling.
Executive: That's what I am telling. First meeting, when you are joining with me, I told, every time, when you are calling, IndiaMART will run like this only sir. So many people are there. So many options are there. If you are okay, you move on. Or in basic only, you can continue. But like this only, you will get direct calls, messages. Buylead will allocate like this only, telling step by step, I had guided you.
Customer: That's why madam, now nearby they are there, that's why, thinking of courier, they will buy in nearby only, you are telling?
Executive: Yes. For that, not like that. Bulk orders, they will give. Because wholesale doing people, trading doing people, they will purchase. But every time, it will not be available. If you are taking bulk orders every time, it will not be that much, I am telling. It depends on buyer's requirement. Direct calls, direct messages means, I have to search sambrani cup and in that particularly, I have to message to Jain cup.
Customer: Okay, we will see madam, what to see.
Executive: Okay, okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting enough buyleads.

- Customer wants to know why no leads are generated.



Resolution:

- Executive explained lead generation process.

- Executive mentioned about catalog update and sharing leads.

- Executive explained about the packages.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will check the leads.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, catalog, payment
